ygData.subject: EasterQuest!
ygData.msgSnippet: Happy Easter, everyone!  Just in time for this wonderful holiday, I present to you a website dedicated to all the little inside jokes, pop-culture references,
ygData.messageBody:
Happy Easter, everyone! Just in time for this wonderful holiday, I present
to you a website dedicated to all the little inside jokes, pop-culture
references, and humourous oddities - in other words, the Easter Eggs of
Everquest. I call the site EasterQuest! Warning!!! There are some
spoilers, so if you don't want to be spoiled like last years eggs that were
never found (ewwwww....) don't stop by. For the rest of you:

Onward to Easterquest! (http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/everquest/easterquest.htm)

Talies the Wanderer
